captions.text:
HEY, WHAT DO YOU THINK
ABOUT ITALIAN?

DEPENDS. WE TALKIN'
PIZZA OR PASTA?

HANG ON, DUDE,
I GOT SOMETHING COOLER.

YOU SHOULD INVITE HER
ON A STUDY DATE.

WE WERE UP ALL NIGHT
FARMING THIS GUY.
DO YOU KNOW WHAT THIS MEANS?

SCORE! MORE TIME FOR QUESTING.
B.D., I'M LOOKING AT YOU.

OH, SORRY, DUDE.
I GOTTA GO GET READY.

WE'RE MEETING THE NEW
FPS COACH TODAY.

AW, MAN, THERE'S ALWAYS
AN FPS THING.

HOW CAN YOU
THINK ABOUT GRINDING
AT A TIME LIKE THIS?

I HAVEN'T LEARNED
ANYTHING IN WEEKS.
I'M OFF TO YELL AT CALHOUN.

WHATEVER. I GUESS
I'LL NAB SOME Z's
BEFORE DRIFT CLASS.

PSYCH. I DON'T
GET SLEEPY, B.D.

HERE. YOU COULD USE
THE EXTRA FUEL.

WHAT IS ALL THIS
STUFF, JENNY?

ANYTHING TO SHOW
THE NEW COACH
I AM AWESOME!

OH, YEAH, WHATEVER GETS ME
TAPED TO THAT FLAGPOLE.

WAIT, THEY TAPE YOU
TO A FLAGPOLE?

PLUS I'M GOING
TO LOSE MY MIND

IF I HAVE TO
KEEP BABYSITTING J.V.

OH, NOT YOU.
I MEAN, YOU'RE GREAT.

STOW IT, NERDS!
THE TRIAL'S ON!

WELL, ANOTHER BAD DAY
IN COURT FOR VGHS
SUPERSTAR THE LAW,

WORD HAS COME IN THAT
FORMER FPS COACH BOB JACKSON

REFUSING TO TESTIFY
ON LAW'S BEHALF.

HEY. HOW Y'ALL
DOIN' OUT THERE?

THANKS FOR COMING OUT.
REALLY MEANS A LOT.

ALL RIGHT, LET'S JUST
GET THROUGH THIS.

UM... IN LIGHT OF THESE SUPER
BOGUS CHEATING ALLEGATIONS,
AND OUT OF RESPECT TO VGHS,

THE LAST PLACE IN THE WORLD
THAT TRULY BELIEVES IN ME,

TO PUNCH THROUGH
MY PREPARED STATEMENT,

AND SWEAR VENGEANCE
ON THE LOSER

YOU'RE GOING DOWN, BUDDY,
JUST LIKE THIS PODIUM!

NO! I NEVER CHEAT
AND I NEVER LOSE!

I'M ALL GASSED UP
AND READY TO RIDE!

I CAN'T BELIEVE
I DATED THAT GUY.

SO, I WAS GONNA GRAB
SOME PIZZA AND PASTA

THEY KIND OF WANT TO JUST
STAY INSIDE AND HANG OUT.

OH, ARE THEY
ALLERGIC TO ANYTHING,
BECAUSE I COULD MAKE

UM, IT WAS JUST GONNA BE
THE TWO OF US.

GRAB SOME ITALIAN FOOD
AND MAYBE CATCH A MOVIE.

DOESN'T REALLY SOUND
LIKE HANGING OUT, BRIAN.

SOUNDS LIKE YOU'RE
ASKING ME ON A...

YOU KNOW,
WHEN YOU LIKE SOMEONE

AND YOU'RE ASKING
THEM ON... WHAT?

I AM ASKING YOU
ON A DATE, JENNY.

THIRTY SECONDS LATE, JENNY.
OFF TO A BAD START.

AH. NO DOUBT TOILING
OVER THE BOOK REPORT
YOU WERE ABOUT TO GIVE ME.

AW, SHUCKS,
I LEFT IT IN MY ROOM.

CAN I JUST
GET IT TO YOU MONDAY?
YOU DIDN'T DO IT, DID YOU?
I SUPER DID IT. I SWEAR.

THEN DELIVER UNTO ME
AT THE FPS TOURNEY THE REPORT.

Man: WE HAVE AN FPS TEAM
IN SHAMBLES,

AND YOU BRING ON A WILD CARD
LIKE MARY MATRIX?

FOR THE SAKE OF YOUR JOB,
CALHOUN,

I HOPE YOU MADE
THE RIGHT CHOICE.

NOT THE RIGHT CHOICE;
THE ONLY CHOICE.

NOW IF YOU'LL EXCUSE ME,
I HAVE A SCHOOL TO RUN.

WHAT THE CRAP
DO YOU TWO WANT?

TELL FREDDIE
TO GIVE ME HOMEWORK.

WE HAVEN'T HAD
AN ASSIGNMENT IN WEEKS.

YOU WANT HOMEWORK?
DIDN'T YOU COME HERE
TO PLAY VIDEO GAMES?

ACTUALLY, I CAME HERE
TO LEARN ABOUT GAMERS:

FREDDIE, COME ON.
YOU KNOW THE RULES.

JUST GIVE HER HOMEWORK
EACH WEEK.

THIS IS A SCHOOL,
GODDAMN IT.

UH, KI, YOUR HOMEWORK
FOR EVERY WEEK

NICE TRY, FREDDIE,
BUT I DON'T THINK
THAT COUNTS.

TO BE WITHDRAWN
FROM FREDDIE'S CLASS.

YEAH, NO. NO, YOU DON'T
GET TO DO THAT.

YOU DON'T GET TO WITHDRAW
FROM CLASS,

YOU HAVE TO GET KICKED OUT
BY THE TEACHER.

AND THAT AIN'T NEVER GONNA
HAPPEN, YOU UGLY NARC!

BUT... OKAY, BUT THAT
DOESN'T MAKE ANY SENSE.

THERE'S GOT TO BE
A LOOPHOLE OR SOMETHING.

WHY DON'T YOU GO LOOK FOR
THAT LOOPHOLE ELSEWHERE?

IF YOU TWO DON'T MIND,
I HAVE A SCHOOL TO RUN.

( chuckles ) THAT'S
WHAT I'M TALKING ABOUT.

I KNEW I COULD COUNT
ON YOU, MY MAN.

RIGHT THERE. LAYING IT DOWN,
LARGE AND IN CHARGE.

SO YOU LOST YOUR
STAR PLAYER. BIG WHOOP.

YOU KNOW WHAT'S BETTER
THAN A STAR PLAYER?

- HAVING A STAR TEAM.
- NO. A STAR COACH. THAT'S ME.

AS HEAD COACH OF
THE DENVER COMMANDOES,

I HAVE NEVER LOST
A PRO CHAMPIONSHIP,

AND I'M SURE AS HELL
NOT GOING TO START
I DO NOT LIKE WASTING TIME.

SPEAKING OF WHICH, J.V.,
I CAN'T BOTHER WITH YOU,

SO YOU JUST DO
WHATEVER IT IS THAT YOU DO.

BANGED IT OUT LAST NIGHT.
MEMORIZE IT BY GAME TIME.

MEMORIZE A MILLION MOVES
BY MONDAY MORNING?

YOU'RE CUT FROM
THE TEAM, ALLITERATOR.

WELL, IT WAS FUN
WHILE IT LASTED.

SO I'LL SEE THE REST
OF YOU AT THE GAME.

SO YOUR MOM'S
THE NEW COACH.

I'LL SEE YOU
AT SEVEN, BRIAN.

OKAY, YEAH.
SEE YOU AT MY PLACE.

TRYING TO BUTTER UP
THE NEW COACH?

YEAH, SO I CAN
HANDLE OUR ANNUAL
PHONE CALL, BUT, UM,

IS THERE A REASON
WHY YOU'RE HERE?

YEAH, CALHOUN
CALLED IN A FAVOR,
AND I THOUGHT, WHY NOT?

I'LL STOP MY DAUGHTER
FROM SCREWING UP HER CAREER.

ABOUT THAT SPOT
ON VARSITY, I WANT IT.

- AND WHEN YOU'RE
READY FOR IT, I'LL--
- READY? ARE YOU SERIOUS?

IS THERE ANYTHING ELSE?
I HAVE A GAME THAT
I NEED TO PREP FOR.

I'M GONNA BE UP ALL NIGHT
DOING THIS LONG,

DO YOU WANT TO SPLIT
A PIZZA AND GO TO BED?

HEY, TED,
I NEED YOUR HELP!

TED, WAIT!
YOU LEFT YOUR HOME...

OKAY, MAN,
THIS PLACE IS BOOKS!

NOW I'VE REALLY GOT TO HIT
THE CLEAN THIS PLACE SPOTLESS.

HEY, WHAT DO YOU THINK--
TOMMY VERCETTI OR MAX PAYNE?

I DON'T WANT TO
SMELL LIKE A GUY
WITH NOTHING TO LOSE--

NO, NO, NO, NO.
TED, YOU GOTTA WAKE UP, MAN.

JENNY'S GONNA
BE HERE ANY SECOND!

UH, SURE THING, MISS...
COACH. WHAT'S UP?

IT SMELLS LIKE YOU GOT A DATE,
SO I'LL JUST CUT TO THE CHASE.

I JUST TALKED TO VARSITY.
WHEW, THEY HATE YOU.

YEAH,
I SAID THE SAME THING.

SEE, I NEED SOMEONE
TO MAKE THEM MAD,

TO LIGHT A FIRE
UNDER THEIR ASSES,
AND YOUR ASS IS THAT FIRE.

SO, I AM STARTING YOU
IN THE VARSITY GAME TOMORROW.

UH, BENNY. TED BENNY.
MY ROOMMATE TED BENNY.

THE STORIES I COULD TELL YOU
ABOUT TED BENNY.

OH, MAN, I'M SURE
HE'S ON ONE OF HIS
CLASSIC JAMS AGAIN.

DO YOU MIND IF WE SKIP DINNER
AND JUST STAY IN TONIGHT?

BUT, UM, THE DIP, THE DIP--
WHERE'S THE DIP?

DIP?
OH, I MUST HAVE FORGOT.

LOOK, JENNY, JUST BECAUSE
TED AND KI AREN'T HERE
DOESN'T MEAN I DON'T WANT DIP.

UM... I THINK I HAVE
SOME PICANTE IN MY ROOM.

THAT SOUNDS GREAT.
YEAH, GO GET THAT.

( feigned laughter )
OH, HE'S SO FUNNY!

I REALLY THINK
THAT WHO YOU SHOULD--

I'LL SEE YOU
AT THE GAME, BRIAN.

JENNY, WAIT. LISTEN,
WE GOTTA TALK, ALL RIGHT?

DO YOU MIND IF WE
JUST RELAX TONIGHT?

COME ON, TED.
COME ON, TED, BE AWAKE.

SHE LOOKS ADORABLE.
I THINK WE'RE GONNA CUDDLE!

BUT-- BUT-- HER MOM WANTS
TO START ME IN VARSITY TOMORROW,
BUT SHE WANTS TO START TOMORROW,

AND IF I TELL HER,
THAT'S GONNA RUIN OUR DATE.

- DUDE, WHAT DO I DO?
- Ki: BRIAN?

BRIAN, DO YOU HAVE
ANY HOMEWORK?

OH, I DON'T KNOW,
AND I DON'T CARE.

I JUST FINISHED HIS HOMEWORK,
AND I NEED MORE.

- Ki: WHAT DO I DO?
- HAVE YOU TRIED--?

ONE SECOND, BRIAN, I HAVE
ANOTHER PHONE CALL COMING IN.

HELLO, KI'S PHONE.
THIS IS KI SPEAKING.

THIS ISN'T
WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE.

LOOKS LIKE YOU'RE
DOING YOUR HOMEWORK.

THIS IS NOT MINE,
I PROMISE.

OH, IF IT'S
NOT YOURS, THAT'S--

ISN'T THAT THE HOMEWORK
I ASSIGNED YOU?

"F" STANDS FOR MORE
THAN JUST FREDDIE, KI.

- NO, NO, NO, NO, NO, NO.
- YES.

SORRY.
I WANTED TO TELL YOU,

I MEAN, YOU SAID YES
TO US DATING--

OR AT LEAST
GOING ON A DATE--
I DIDN'T WANT TO RUIN IT.

WELL, IF IT MAKES YOU
FEEL BETTER,

I HAD A WEDGIE BEFORE
THEY PUT ME UP HERE,

AND EVERYTHING I DO
MAKES IT WORSE.

YOU'VE GOT A LONG NIGHT
AHEAD OF YOU,

AND AN ENTIRE PLAYBOOK
TO LEARN.

IF I GROVEL SOME MORE,
WILL YOU CUT ME DOWN?

AND RUIN 40 YEARS
OF TRADITION?
FAT CHANCE.

PAGE ONE. THE PANAMA
PINCER FORMATION.

YOU HAVE TWO
GUYS ON THE LEFT,

AND THE REST OF YOUR TEAM
STAYS BACK ON BASE.

AT SECOND 30, YOU SEND OUT
THE REST OF THE TEAM...

OH, CRAP,
I FORGOT MY HOMEWORK!

THE LAW, IN REGARDS
TO THE CHARGE

OF AIMBOTTING
IN THE FIRST DEGREE,

ON BEHALF OF "FIELD OF FIRE"
CUSTOMER SUPPORT,

YOUR ACCOUNT IS HEREBY BANNED
FOR A PERIOD OF NO SHORTER

ALSO, THE VGHS VARSITY FPS TEAM
IS STRIPPED OF ITS VICTORIES

AND BANNED FROM THIS YEAR'S
HIGH SCHOOL CHAMPIONSHIP.

THANK YOU FOR CONTACTING
CUSTOMER SUPPORT,

AND MY GOD HAVE MERCY
ON YOUR SOUL!

VARSITY CAN'T EVEN
GO TO PLAYOFFS.

DID YOU EVEN READ
YOUR CONTRACT, MARY?
YOU SIGNED ON FOR A SEASON.

- NO DICE.
- DON'T YOU DICE ME.

HAVE YOUR LAWYERS
CALL MY LAWYERS.

AND IT LOOKS LIKE THIS GAME
IS FINALLY GETTING UNDER--

WAIT A MINUTE.
IS THIS THE J.V. TEAM?

WHAT THE HECK IS
MARY MATRIX THINKING?

IF SHE JUST RECEIVED THE SAME
NEWS BULLETIN I DID,

SHE'S THINKING, THANK GOD
FOR WEIRD STUDENT KI SWAN,

ALLOWING J.V.
TO TAKE VARSITY'S PLACE

IN VGHS'S BID
FOR THE CHAMPIONSHIP.

I GUESS SINCE TECHNICALLY
THE CSA'S RULING

APPLIES ONLY TO VARSITY,
THE J.V. SQUAD CAN DO--

WELL, WHO CARES.
IT MAKES FOR GREAT TV.

IT'S JUST LIKE
ANY OTHER GAME, GUYS.

Jumpin' Jacks:
EXCEPT WE LOSE ALL OUR GAMES.

- Jenny: LET'S GO!
- All: VIDEO GAME!

- GO FOR THE BOMB.
- THIRTY SECONDS TO PLANT.

OH. ALL RIGHT.
LET'S DO THIS THING.
BE THAT WHAT I THINK IT BE?

"A"-PLUS. THE BEST PAPER
I'VE EVER LOOKED AT.

AH. IT PAINS ME TO ADMIT,
OLD FRIEND,

AND VGHS SCORES BY THE SKIN
OF THEIR LUCKY UNDERPANTS.

THEY'LL NEED MORE THAN
UNDERPANTS TO CLOSE THE DEAL

I DON'T KNOW WHO DID, BUT...
I'M REALLY SORRY.

I WANTED TO DO IT,
I JUST... DIDN'T.

THERE'S NO EXCUSE.
I'M A BUTT.

A BUTT YE MAY BE,
BUT AN HONEST BUTT AT THAT.

PLEASE TELL ME THAT SOMEBODY
READ MY PLAYBOOK.

TANK UP FRONT. GAMES,
MORIARTY, MAKE SOME NOISE.

HERE I COME! LOOK OUT
FOR JUMPIN' JACKS!

IT ALL COMES DOWN
TO JENNY MATRIX AND BRIAN D.

DON'T BLOW UP!
DON'T BLOW UP!

JENNY, GET READY FOR
THE SHOT OF YOUR L--

PRACTICE IS AT FIVE A.M.
DON'T BE LATE.

BUT I DIDN'T FIND
A LOOPHOLE FOR, UM...

KI. HE MEANS
A LOOPHOLE TO HIS HEART.

IT SUCKS, BUT WE'RE
ON VARSITY NOW,

AND I'M THE CAPTAIN
OF VARSITY.

I HAVE TO GET US
TO PLAYOFFS.

NO, JENNY,
I DON'T HATE YOU.

I'LL SEE YOU
AT PRACTICE, CAPTAIN.

THIS IS GONNA BE
A WEIRD YEAR, BRIAN.

AS LONG AS THE THREE
OF US ARE TOGETHER--

NO QUESTING UNTIL
YOU HAVE TEN PAGES.

SORRY, BUDDY.
YOU JUST TOLD US
TO KEEP YOU FOCUSED.

HEY, BRIAN D!
MY BEST BUDDY!
WHAT'S UP?

SO, MARY MATRIX MADE
YOU AND ME ROOMMATES.

PUT ALL OF
MY STUFF EVERYWHERE.

title: Video Game High School (VGHS) - S2: Ep. 1
